verbs.description: " Obama [V: should] sue Trump for saying that he wiretapped him . "
" [ARG0: Obama] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: sue] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: for saying that he wiretapped him] . "
" Obama should sue [ARG0: Trump] for [V: saying] [ARG1: that he wiretapped him] . "
" Obama should sue Trump for saying that [ARG0: he] [V: wiretapped] [ARG1: him] . "
